Method Detail

create

public static Position create(long quantity,
                              double unitaryPrice,
                              double factor)

create

public static Position create(long quantity,
                              double unitaryPrice,
                              double unitaryEntryPrice,
                              double factor)

getSide

public PositionSide getSide()
Returns:
the side of this position. Not to be mistaken for Side that doesn't include FLAT_POSITION

getQuantity

public long getQuantity()
Returns:
the quantity held by this position. This is not adjusted by factor (this quantity is the same as expressed in buy(quantity) for instance)

getUnitaryEntryPrice

public double getUnitaryEntryPrice()
Returns:
the price paid per unit to enter this position, that is market price not adjusted by factor, expressed in the currency of the instrument of the position

getUnitaryPrice

public double getUnitaryPrice()
Returns:
the current unit price held by the position, that is current market price of one unit, expressed in the currency of the instrument of the position

getAmount

public double getAmount()
Returns:
the current amount for this position, that is computed value at current market price of full position, including factor, expressed in position's instrument's currency

getEntryAmount

public double getEntryAmount()
Returns:
the cumulated entry amount for this position, that is the price paid to enter this position including factor, expressed in position's instrument's currency

isLong

public boolean isLong()
Returns:
true if this position is long, i.e. quantity is positive, and side is Long

isShort

public boolean isShort()
Returns:
true if this position is short, i.e. quantity is positive, and side is Short

isFlat

public boolean isFlat()
Returns:
true if this position is flat, i.e. quantity is 0

add

public Position add(Position transactionPosition)

updatePrice

public Position updatePrice(double close)
